Title: The Conjuring 2
Writer: Chad Hayes (screenplay by), Carey W. Hayes (screenplay by), James Wan (screenplay by), David Leslie Johnson-McGoldrick (screenplay by), Chad Hayes (story by), Carey W. Hayes (story by), James Wan (story by), Chad Hayes (based on characters created by), Carey W. Hayes (based on characters created by)
Actors: Patrick Wilson, Vera Farmiga, Madison Wolfe, Frances O'Connor
Plot: Ed and Lorraine Warren travel to North London to help a single mother raising 4 children alone in a house plagued by a supernatural spirit.
